skills.desc: Increases the duration of all buffs on all allies by 1 turn. Also decreases the duration of all debuffs on all allies by 1 turn. Places a 25% [Increase ATK] buff on all allies for 2 turns.

skills.desc: Places a [Shield] buff on all allies for 2 turns. The value of the [Shield] depends on this Champion's Level. Heals each ally according to the number of buffs they are currently under.
